abstracts.cdata!:
The loan would help finance the foreign
            exchange cost component of: (a) investment subprojects of
            small private mines; (b) provision of assistance to GEOBOL;
            (c) technical assistance to MMM for a cadastral survey and
            sector planning, and to BAMIN for staff training, project
            appraisal and supervision and management control. The cost
            of this component would be borne by the Government.
